textTemplates.name: Body_EN
textTemplates.text:
Hello


As you have recently contacted the Seller Support Center, we would like to know your rating of our support and what could be improved. Please take 2 minutes to provide us with feedback, by clicking on the following link: LINK


Thanks in advance for your time

The Seller Support Team

textTemplates.name: Body_FR
textTemplates.text:
Bonjour


Comme vous avez rcemment contact le centre d'assistance aux vendeurs, nous aimerions connatre votre valuation de notre assistance et ce qui pourrait tre amlior. Veuillez prendre 2 minutes pour nous faire part de vos commentaires, en cliquant sur le lien suivant : LINK


Merci d'avance pour votre temps

The Seller Support Team

textTemplates.name: EN_BuybackCasePaid_EmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Hello,


As mentioned in a previous email, one or more of your direct debit payments in the amount of {!$Record.Chargeback_Amount__c} were refused by your bank. 

Weve since received your transfer covering the overdraft amount as well as the fee of 7,5 per order, so your account has been reactivated.

Thanks for your payment. Youre all set to participate in BuyBack again.


Best,

BackBot

textTemplates.name: EN_NewCase_Buyback_EmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Hello,


Recently one or more of your direct debit payments for {!$Record.Account.Name} were refused by your bank. See details attached.

Dont worry, we covered the payment of each order for you, but youll be billed for the total amount of the orders plus a fee of 7,5 per order. 

Your store has been taken offline temporarily but will be reactivated once you have transferred the money and we have proof of the deposit.

You can find Back Markets invoice and bank details attached to this email. Please note the invoice must be paid as soon as possible.


Feel free to reach out with any questions.

Best,

Back Market

textTemplates.name: FR_BuybackCasePaid_EmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Bonjour,


Comme annonc il y a quelques jours, un ou plusieurs de vos paiements effectus par prlvement SEPA ont t refuss ces dernires semaines, pour un montant de {!$Record.Chargeback_Amount__c}.

Vous avez t dbit du montant des paiements et de la pnalit de 7,5 par commande.

Votre Portefeuille Virtuel tant suffisamment crdit, ces montants ont pu tre compenss, conformment l'article "Paiement compensatoire" de nos CGV, comme indiqu sur la dernire facture. Votre compte de rachat a donc t ractiv.


Bien vous,

L'quipe Buyback

textTemplates.name: FR_BuybackCasePaid_EmailSubject
textTemplates.text: [Reprise] - Votre boutique est de nouveau en ligne - Merci pour votre rgularisation

textTemplates.name: FR_NewCase_Buyback_EmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Bonjour,


Un ou plusieurs paiements effectus par le magasin {!$Record.Account.Name} (qui est en prlvement SEPA) ont t refuss courant ces dernires semaines. Le dtail des paiements est en pice jointe.

En raison du refus de votre banque, Back Market a pris en charge le paiement de chaque commande plus une pnalit de 7,5 euros par commande. Le montant TTC des commandes et la pnalit vous sont donc refacturs.

Par consquent, votre compte a t mis hors ligne. Il sera ractiv une fois la preuve de virement envoye.

Je vous joins donc la facture et le RIB de Back Market. La facture est rgler au plus vite.


N'hsitez pas nous contacter si vous rencontrez un problme ou pour toute information complmentaire.

Bonne journe,

Back Market

textTemplates.name: US_BuybackCasePaid_EmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Hello,


As mentioned in a previous email, one or more of your direct debit payments in the amount of {!$Record.Chargeback_Amount__c} were refused by your bank. 

Weve since received your transfer covering the overdraft amount as well as the fee of $8 per order, so your account has been reactivated.

Thanks for your payment. Youre all set to participate in BuyBack again.


Best,

BackBot

textTemplates.name: US_EN_BuybackCasePaid_EmailSubject
textTemplates.text: [BuyBack] Your store is back online thanks for your payment

textTemplates.name: US_EN_NewCase_Buyback_EmailSubject
textTemplates.text: [BuyBack] Overdraft alert the bank account for {!$Record.Account.Name} has been overdrawn

textTemplates.name: US_NewCase_Buyback_EmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Hello,


Recently one or more of your direct debit payments for {!$Record.Account.Name} were refused by your bank. See details attached.

Dont worry, we covered the payment of each order for you, but youll be billed for the total amount of the orders plus a fee of $8 per order. 

Your store has been taken offline temporarily but will be reactivated once you have transferred the money and we have proof of the deposit.

You can find Back Markets invoice and bank details attached to this email. Please note the invoice must be paid as soon as possible.


Feel free to reach out with any questions.

Best,

Back Market
